meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – Royal Navy Dial & Features
meta_description: Discover the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 Royal Navy dial variant, featuring matte black finish, red 3H tritium luminous markers, military-issued details, and powered by the durable Lemania 5100 automatic movement. A legendary 1980s military chronograph.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177 Royal Navy dial, Military Chronograph Royal Navy, Porsche Design black dial, Lemania 5100 chronograph, 3H luminous dial, 1980s military watch, Orfina Porsche Navy watch, Porsche Design chronograph features

text: The Royal Navy variant has two debated origins.

list.title: Theory 1: Quasi-Issued -
list.text:
the first is that these are quasi-issued
and were not issued to NATO stock, as they lack the traditional
caseback broad arrow marking and any typical MOD markings.

list.title: Theory 2: Issued -
list.text:
the other theory is that they were, in fact,
issued to NATO stock but only a small number for evaluation by
the Royal Navy - all of which were marked and issued with a
NATO stock code on their caseback.

list.title: Royal Navy Dial:
list.text:
The dial of this variant bears the inscription “Royal Navy”
below the PORSCHE DESIGN text at 3 o'clock.

list.title: Finishes:
list.text:
It is believed that most, if not all, were produced in Silver/Sablé,
but examples have been seen in an NTS PVD case.

list.title: Bracelet:
list.text:
Royal Navy examples are commonly found, with an Orfina
signed “lobster” bracelet instead of the standard NSA bracelet.
